title: Nemesis Now Medieval Templar Knight Figurine, Hand-Painted Resin Renaissance Sculpture - Take The Knee
features: Historical Templar Knight Figurine: A beautifully detailed depiction of a Templar Knight, capturing the strength and nobility of the medieval order.
Kneeling Knight Pose: This figurine shows a knight in a thoughtful kneeling position, resting his hand on his knee while gripping his sword, symbolizing reflection and reverence.
Premium Resin Craftsmanship: Made from high-quality resin, this figurine offers durability and a remarkable level of detail that brings the knight to life.
Expertly Hand-Painted: Every feature, from the folds of the knight’s white mantle with the red cross to the etchings on his sword, is carefully hand-painted with incredible precision.
Discover Nemesis Now: Creators of original, officially licensed pop culture merchandise, giftware, and collectibles from top music, gaming, TV, and film brands. Elevate your collection with us.
description: Honor the courage and reverence of the legendary Templar knights with the "Take The Knee" figurine, a striking representation of a knight in a moment of quiet reflection. This powerful piece depicts a kneeling knight, with one hand resting on his knee and the other gripping his sword, embodying the nobility and strength of the Templar order. Crafted from premium resin and expertly hand-painted, the figurine showcases intricate details, including the knight's iconic white mantle with the bold red cross and fine etchings on his sword. Whether you're a history enthusiast, admirer of medieval legends, or collector of beautifully designed art, "Take The Knee" is an exceptional addition to any collection. It’s the perfect centerpiece for your living room, study, or home office, adding both elegance and strength to your space. Packaged in an elegant gift box, this figurine also makes a meaningful gift for history buffs, collectors, or anyone fascinated by the medieval era. Bring history to life with this exquisite figurine and celebrate the valor of the Templar knights.
